shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dawit “Psalter” (fols. 3r-175va) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David” (fols. 3r-137v) I-2) Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets” (fols. 137rv-151v) I-3) Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy “Song of Songs” (fols. 151v-159r) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam “Praise of Mary” (fols. 159v-170va) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light” (fols. 170va-175va)
Additiones 1-7.

owners.owner: According to Additio 5, the Ms. belongs to the coenobitic community. Before the Ms. most probably belong to Wäldä Maryam (see Additiones 2 and 3) and then to Gäbrä ʾIyäsus (see Additio 4).

txstates.txstate: The Ms. has been probably resewn. The spine cover and the inlays are missing. Many fols. are stained with wax and dirt.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather (partly missing). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament, of poor quality, on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 2 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, two close to the head and two close to the tail of the codex.

txfolios.txfolio: Foliation mistake: fol. 99 is followed by fol. 110; numbers 100-109, 124 are missing.

squires.squire:
A(1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – ፪II(8/fols. 11r-18v) – ፫III(8/fols. 19r-26v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 27r-34v) – ፭V(8/fols. 35r-42v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 43r-50v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 51r-58v) – ፰VIII(8/ fols. 59r-66v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 67r-74v) – ፲X(10/fols. 75r-84v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 85r-92v) – ፲፪XII(8/fols. 93r-110v) – ፲፫XIII(8/fols. 111r-118v) – ፲፬XIV(8/fols. 119r-127v) – ፲፭XV(8/fols. 128r-135v) – ፲፮XVI(8/fols. 136r-143v) – ፲፯XVII(8/fols. 144r-151v) – ፲፰XVIII(8/fols. 152r-159v) – ፲፱XIX(8/fols. 160r-167v) – ፳XX(8; s.l.: 5 stub after 4; l. 9 is missing/fols. 168r-175v).
The last leaf of the codex (in quire XX) has been removed.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 4r.
taunit.rl-info:
Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are not visible. The upper line is written above the ruling (below the ruling on fols. 79r-80v). The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The bottom ruled line was not used by the scribe on fols. 78v-80v.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data are for fol. 160r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are not visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Numeral ፮ “six” looks like compressed numeral ፯ “seven”.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; incipits and numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); name of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; letter እ in the word እስመ in Ps. 135; names of the days of the week in the upper margin in Text I-4; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A few groups of lines (alternating with black lines) on the incipit page of Text I-1; two lines (alternating with a black line) on the incipit page of Ps. 101 (fol. 85r) and of Text I-4.

abbreviations.abbreviation: እ᎓ for እስመ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ ምሕረቱ᎓ (Ps. 135, fol. 127r-v) ስ᎓ for ስቡሕኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ወልዑልኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ (Canticle 10, fol. 147r-v) Text I-4 ሰአ፡ (ቅ፡) for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት Words or their abbreviations stand for the whole refrain. ሠ፡ for ሠረቀ፡ በሥጋ፡ እምድንግል፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ዘርአ፡ ብእሲ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 159va-160rb) እ᎓ for እስመ፡ በፈቃዱ፡ ወበሥምረቱ፡ አቡሁ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መጽአ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 161vb-162rb) ኵ፡ for ኵሉ፡ ትውልድ፡ ያስተበፅዑኪ፡ ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ (fols. 162vb-164ra) ናዓ፡ for ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። እስመ፡ ሣህልኪ፡ ይኵን፡ ላዕለ፡ ኵልነ (fols. 165ra-166va) ለ፡/ለኪ፡ for ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ እመ፡ ብርሃን፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ በስብሐት፡ ወበውዳሴ (fols. 166vb-167va) ተ፡ for ተፈሥሒ፡ ኦምልዕልተ፡ ጸጋ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኪ፡ ሞገስ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ (fols. 168rb-169ra) ወ፡/ወበ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 169va-170rb) Text I-5 ወ፡ ሣ፡ ይ፡ ሰ፡ ቅ፡ for ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፈለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት The abbreviations stand for the whole refrain. ወ፡/ወበ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 171vb-175ra)

otherdetails.otherdetail: - Ps. 118 is not numbered. - Traditional interpretation of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 is missing.

additional.det: The notes are written in a poor hand. The name of the original supplicant has been erased and replaced with that of Gäbrä ʾIyäsus.

additional.cont: Fols. 10, 85: Exhortation to the readers to call the name (of the donor?).
additional.tran: Fols. 10, 85: Those reading this Psalter, I implore you to call my name, Wäldä Maryam.
additional.det: The note is written in Amharic, in the same hand as Additio 3, partly in red ink. A similar supplication with the name of Wäldä Yoḥannǝs, is written by the same hand on fol. 85r.

additional.cont: Fols. 10r, 17v, 50r, 59v, 98r, 120r, 131r, 159r: Short supplication for the soul of Wäldä Maryam.
additional.tran: Fols. 10r, 17v, 36r, 50r, 59v, 98r, 120r, 131r, 159r: May the soul of Wäldä Maryam rest in peace.
additional.det: The notes are written in the same hand as Additio 2, in red ink.

additional.cont: Fol. 98r, 120r, 131r, 151v, 159r: Supplication for the soul of Gäbrä ˀIyäsus.
additional.det: The supplications are written in the same hand which added the name of Gäbrä ʾIyäsus into Additio 1. They are written over supplications dedicated to Wäldä Maryam (see Additio 3).

additional.tran: Fol. 159r: This book is of the coenobitic community.
additional.det: The note is written in the same hand as the Additio 6. ʾAndǝnnät (“unity, oneness”) is the Amharic term for the coenobitic monastic community.

additional.cont: Fol. 159r: Calendaric note concerning the  feasts of the Apostles and Disciples.
additional.det: The note is written in the same hand as the Additio 5.

additional.cont: Fol. 175v: Säˀalnakä mäḥari... “We ask You, the Merciful...” , litanic prayer, incomplete.
additional.tran:
Fol. 175v: We beseech You, merciful God, we beseech You,
We beseech You, mighty God, we beseech You,
We beseech You, Creator, we beseech You,
Do not reject, do not detach, do not withdraw from those who beg You
Your right hand – the fountain of life
Your right hand – the fountain of blessing and joy
Bless us, o Christ, with the gifts of the prophets and the apostles
With the gifts of the righteous and martyrs
With the gifts of the pure and monks
With the gifts of vigilant angels
With the gifts of Our Lady Mary, the Mother of God....
additional.det: For the same prayer s. SDM-000 and EMML 328/1.

extras.extra: - The title ዳዊት and the internal number of the monastic library (324) are written, in black, on fol. 1r. - The midpoint of the “Psalms of David” (in Ps. 77) is marked on fol. 65v with a cross (see also “Decoration”. - The Pss. are divided into groups of ten separated by a crudely drawn zig zag, in blue pen. - The scribe reduced the size of his handwriting to accommodate the whole line or the end of the line: fols. 19r, 25v, 41v, 42v, 72v, 84v, 111v, 120v, 121r, 138v. - Part of the line is taken up: fols. 10v, 25r, 72v, 146r, 155v. - Omitted letters, words, lines or passages written interlineally, in a secondary hand the same as that of Additiones 2 and 3: e.g., fols. 10v, 18r, 27r, 41v, 54v, 59r, 66v, 71r, 80r, 86v, 92v, 113v, 118v, 136r, 144r, 158r. - Corrections written over erasures: fols. 41v, 71v, 163ra. - Erasures: 60r, 131r. - Scribbles: fols. 2v, 36r, 41r, 42r, 74r, 133r, 152v.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: Undecorated quire marks are written in the left upper margin of fols. 11r, 19r, 27r, 35r, 43r, 51r, 59r, 67r, 75r, 85r, 93r, 111r, 119r, 128r, 136r, 144r, 152r, 160r, 168r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Daily readings of Text I-4 are indicated by the names of the days of the week written in the upper margin, in the main hand: ዘሠሉሥ: fol. 160va ዘረቡዕ: fol. 162va ዘሐሙስ: fol. 164rb ዘዓርብ: fol. 166va ዘቀዳሚት: fol. 168ra ዘእሑድ: fol. 169rb.

drawing.info: Fol. 65v: Small cross in black and red.

frames.frame: Fol. 84v (explicit of Ps. 100): Simple coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
